name: Spongebob Slaughterpants
description:
In this spine-chilling single-player horror game, you take on the role of a detective investigating the mysterious death of a janitor in the basement of The Rusty Krab. As you descend into the murky depths of the fast-food joint, you'll uncover twisted secrets and supernatural forces at play. Armed only with your wits, you'll have to navigate the dark and sinister corridors, solve puzzles, and unravel the truth behind the janitor's untimely demise. But beware, as you dive deeper into the investigation, you may find that the basement is not as empty as it first appears, and something sinister is lurking in the shadows, waiting to claim its next victim.

Please report any bugs you find in the comments section below, thanks!
